countdown.title: Counting Down To The Big Day

invitation.shloka:
Vakratunda Mahakaya Suryakoti Samaprabha
Nirvighnam Kuru Me Deva Sarva Karyeshu Sarvada
invitation.blessing: With the blessings of Lord Ganesha and our elders, we cordially invite you to the auspicious occasion of the wedding of

groom.label: Groom
groom.name: Vinod
groom.parents: S/o Smt. Sharda & Shri Jagdish Ji Bhadrecha

bride.label: Bride
bride.name: Manisha
bride.parents: D/o Smt. Krishna Devi & Late Shri Ramkumar Ji Danewa

baan.title: Haldi (Baan)
baan.desc: Turmeric ceremony blessing the couple before the wedding.

ratijoga.title: Ratijoga
ratijoga.desc: Traditional Rajasthani folk songs sung through the night.

preetibhoj.title: Preetibhoj (Feast)
preetibhoj.desc: Wedding feast at Gram Jaisangsar, Sardarshahar, Churu.

baarat.title: Baarat Departure
baarat.desc: Wedding procession from Jaisangsar to Malsisar, Teh. Bhadra, Hanumangarh.

rsvp.message: Hello! I would like to RSVP for Vinod & Manisha's wedding on March 9, 2026.
